text: my name is Bill Pollan and I directed
love and mercy certainly one of the more
exciting elements of the film for me
were the studio sequences that we shot
to recreate the pets on sessions
Paul Dino who plays Brian past is in the
studio kind of working with musicians
the Wrecking Crew on starting to put
together his ideas for cutscenes I think
that documentary feel of being in the
studio with someone and having it be all
very spontaneous and very dynamic
accomplished the overwhelming first
thing was the ability that we had by
shooting in Los Angeles to be able to
shoot in the original studio that Brian
did his work on Pet Sounds in the second
thing was to you know not hire actors
but hire real musicians to play the
so-called wrecking crew that and the
stream musicians that were called in
during that time we didn't rehearse them
we just kind of dressed them up in
period clothes and brought him into the
studio much like they would be brought
in on a normal recording session
Oh
